This API endpoint provides data related to the impact of advertisements on the company's profit. It allows you to visualize the effects of various advertising activities on key financial metrics such as gross sales, ad sales, ad spends, COGS (Cost of Goods Sold), Amazon fees, other fees, organic sales, and net profit. The data can be used to analyze the effectiveness of different ad campaigns and make informed decisions to optimize marketing strategies for improved profitability.
This API endpoint provides data related to sales period.

example.message: Your request is accepted, please check queue tasks for status.

get.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve information about tasks that are currently queued for processing. Tasks in the queue typically refer to computational or operational tasks that are awaiting execution or processing. The response from this endpoint would provide details about the tasks in the queue, such as their status, priority, creation time, and any associated metadata.
This endpoint provides list of queue task status available
